A Appendix A.1 Data Sources The trade share reported in Figure 1 is merchandise exports as percent of GDP in 1990 prices, from Maddison (1995, 2001). Maddison provides trade data for selected countries in the years 1820, 1870, 1913, 1929, 1950, 1973 and 1998. To avoid compositional eects, we report the value of merchandise export as a share of GDP for the set of countries with data for all the years (Austria, Belgium, France, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States). The trade share computed using the data for all available countries in every year is very similar to the one displayed in Figure 1.
